nodes.text: Attack on the Inyusu Tor mineral processing facility

In the year 3 ABY, an operative of the Sullustan resistance attacked the Inyusu Tor mineral processing facility, on Sullust, by stuffing a pipe with rags soaked in chemical cocktail, causing the extractors to grind to a halt and the magnetic separators to plunge into the magma flow. The event kick-started a series of roundups in the nearby city of Pinyumb in search of the saboteur. Luko Oorn, the facility's administrator, logged the attack in his records.
The attack was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
